description: shaker is defined and is a function
shaker can make a skinny milkshake.
shaker can make multiple skinny milkshakes.

code:
equal(shaker(1, 'vanilla', true), '1 skinny vanilla milkshake')
equal(shaker(1, 'mango', true), '1 skinny mango milkshake')
equal(shaker(2, 'banana', true), '2 skinny banana milkshakes')
equal(shaker(2, 'chocolate', false), '2 chocolate milkshakes')
equal(shaker(2, 'vanilla', false), '2 vanilla milkshakes')
equal(shaker(2, 'strawberry', false), '2 strawberry milkshakes')
